name: Golden Rails: Harvest of Riddles
description:
HISTORY:

A new adventure awaits in Golden Rails 6: Harvest of Riddles. Join the dynamic duo, Jack and Jill, once again as they answer the call of another mayor that is seeking help to organize a grand fair. The mayor has big plans for the town, and it's up to you to assist Jack and Jill in making them a reality. You'll be tasked with transporting the bountiful harvest of vegetables and repairing old railways to ensure the festival's success.



Delve deeper into the story and you'll uncover a web of intrigue and deceit; stumble upon dark secrets; contraband hidden among the cargo; and a conspiracy that threatens the entire festival.



You, alongside Jack and Jill, will need to piece together the puzzle, find the mastermind behind the scheme, and bring them to justice.



Golden Rails 6 is an adventure packed with mystery, intrigue, and unexpected twists. Can you uncover the truth and save the day? The time has come to harvest the truth and restore order. Join Jack and Jill in their latest adventure now!



Game Features:
60 exciting levels + 6 levels with mini-games
Step-by-step level guide
Catchy downloadable Original Soundtrack
Beautiful desktop wallpapers
60 collectible owls
New mode - search for clues
Unlock improvements and add bonuses to the level
Three difficulty modes: Easy, Normal, and Hard
